page.title: 19PRINCIPLE FEATURES.
page.content: for 12 generations,the present owner being Captain Davies-Cooke. It was first built in 1640 but has been altered several times since then. {M.O.D. Works}(Rhydymwyn)- the works and underground caverns were used for experiments in 1940 in preparation for the atomic bomb. Outside the village are massive steel doors which lead to the caverns and ventilation shafts. Today the cavern and works are secret. {Statimeter Factory}-the original site was taken over by the M.O.D. in 1940. The factory produces instruments for measuring the thrust of jet engines. {Rhosesmor Sand & Gravel Pit}-produces sand,gravel and concrete blocks.An old pump house in Rhydymwyn pumps water from the river to the quarry to wash the stones. {Rhosesmor Village Park}-contains a children's play area and space for
